In June, EOS fell from $0.8142 to $0.5772, while July saw further loss with the token‚Äôs value decreasing to $0.4808. However, by mid-July 2024, EOS recovered back to $0.6100, and on August 23, EOS closed at $0.5566. In September 2024, EOS further dipped near the $0.4600 range, while October also observed the same pattern with prices mostly trending near the $0.450 range. Market sentiment changed in November, and a strong bullish trend was observed throughout the month, and the coin peaked at $1.36 on December 6. Following the late December correction, EOS then recovered into 2025 above the $0.766 mark in January but came down to $0.593 in February. In March, EOS dipped down to the $0.456 level, but it recovered back to the $0.85 level at the start of April, and in May, EOS was changing hands at $0.94 when the market sentiment turned bullish. At the start of July 2025, EOS is trading near $0.54 after a price drop, as the current market sentiment is bearish.

title: Like Cardano (ADA) in 2021? This New DeFi Crypto Could Be the Next 20x Opportunity
body: Back in 2021, early Cardano (ADA) believers watched a few cents transform into life-changing returns. Fast forward to today, and a similar opportunity is emerging‚Äînot in the usual big caps, but in a high-utility DeFi token quietly gaining traction during its presale. Mutuum Finance (MUTM) has already rewarded its early supporters with a 100% increase from Phase 2‚Äôs price of $0.015, and now, as it approaches the final stretch of Phase 5, it‚Äôs being whispered about in the same circles that once speculated on ADA‚Äôs legendary rise. But unlike 2021‚Äôs speculative rallies, Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is engineered with a real income-generating backbone and a sharply focused lending platform that introduces fresh value into decentralized finance. The architecture goes beyond token price hype‚Äîthis is about actual returns on blue-chip crypto holdings. Cardano (ADA) Early Pump in 2021 Cardano (ADA) delivered its most exceptional performance in 2021, skyrocketing 1,520% from $0.1813 to a peak of $2.936 on September 2, per CoinMarketCap. This meteoric rise, outpacing many top cryptocurrencies, was fueled by the Alonzo hard fork in September, which introduced smart contract functionality, enabling DeFi and NFT applications. Strategic partnerships, like the Ethiopia education blockchain deal, and Charles Hoskinson‚Äôs active promotion on X (then Twitter) amplified investor enthusiasm. ADA‚Äôs market cap soared to $94.8 billion at its peak, briefly ranking it third among cryptocurrencies. The broader crypto bull market, driven by institutional adoption and retail FOMO, propelled ADA‚Äôs gains, with trading volumes hitting $4.76 billion daily in August. Despite a year-end dip to $1.31, 2021 cemented Cardano (ADA)‚Äôs reputation as a scalable, research-driven blockchain, with Ouroboros PoS drawing academic praise, per CoinDesk. Real DeFi Utility Backed by Yield and Liquidity At the heart of Mutuum Finance (MUTM) lies an upcoming decentralized lending system designed to deliver what the team calls ‚Äúreal yield.‚Äù Unlike inflationary reward models that rely on token emissions, Mutuum Finance (MUTM)‚Äôs architecture is being built to route actual interest payments from borrowers to lenders‚Äîcreating a sustainable income stream for crypto holders who want to keep exposure to their favorite assets. Once live, the protocol‚Äôs Peer-to-Contract (P2C) model will allow users to lend crypto like $10,000 worth of SOL, receive 10,000mtSOL in 1:1 in return, and potentially earn up to 18% APY (based on pool utilization)‚Äîtranslating to around $1,800 annually. These mtTokens will be ERC-20 compatible and fully liquid, opening the door to additional DeFi strategies such as staking. It‚Äôs passive income reimagined‚Äîwithout relying on third parties or centralized intermediaries. As Mutuum Finance (MUTM) continues its presale momentum as the project has already attracted over 13,600 holders and raised $12.6 million. Currently, Phase 5 is 85% complete, with the price still at $0.03‚Äîbut only 15% of supply remains before the next jump to $0.035, marking what many view as the final entry point before public listing. But Mutuum Finance (MUTM) isn‚Äôt just about passive income. Its Peer-to-Peer (P2P) lending system is being developed to unlock real utility from volatile or underused tokens. Once operational, holders of assets like TRUMP, PEPE will be able to use them as collateral for overcollateralized loans. For example, someone with $8,000 in PEPE could secure a $4,000 USDC loan at a 50% LTV‚Äîwithout needing to sell. Borrowers and lenders will negotiate terms directly, setting interest rates, loan durations, and even allowing for partial fills. Since there will be no shared liquidity pool in P2P lending, lenders will take on more risk‚Äîbut they will also have the potential for higher returns. This structure will preserve the protocol‚Äôs overall safety while broadening earning opportunities. CertiK-Verified, Layer-2 Integrated, and Future-Ready While many DeFi platforms launch with minimal attention to security, Mutuum Finance (MUTM) has placed its reputation in the hands of the industry‚Äôs most trusted auditor. Its CertiK review delivered a Token Scan score of 95 and a Skynet rating of 77.5, placing it well above typical presale benchmarks. In parallel, the platform runs a $50,000 Bug Bounty Program to catch any vulnerabilities and reward community-driven security participation. From a performance standpoint, Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is built on a Layer-2 architecture, meaning users will benefit from lower fees and lightning-fast settlement without sacrificing the trustless nature of Ethereum‚Äôs base layer. Adding to its momentum is a $100,000 giveaway campaign that‚Äôs already bringing in thousands of new participants. The roadmap now looks to beta testing and public release, followed by exchange listings. The current token price of $0.03 is expected to rise to $0.06 on listing, with price forecasts of $2.5 by 2026‚Äîdelivering a clean 83x opportunity for those entering now. Early buyers from Phase 1 have already tripled their position, and those who swapped assets like SOL in Phase 2 are comfortably up by 2x. Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is proving that in a market full of empty promises, sustainable yield, DeFi flexibility, and security-first design can carve out massive upside. For investors who missed ADA‚Äôs legendary breakout, this may be the closest thing the market will offer this cycle. title: Bitcoin Forms Golden Cross Again ‚Äî How High Can BTC Climb?
body: Following an impressive rally to new all-time highs (ATHs), bitcoin has been consolidating below the $120,000 range. However, market analysts have identified a signal that suggests the asset could see more explosive gains in the coming months. This signal is the BTC golden cross. It always forms when its 50-day simple moving average (SMA) crosses the 200-day equivalent. Golden crosses often precede massive price gains, although this does not happen all the time. Golden Cross Appears Again According to the crypto trader Merlijn, the bitcoin golden cross just appeared , increasing the chances of BTC going parabolic in the coming months. The trader mentioned that BTC ballooned 139% when the cross appeared in 2016 and 2,200% when it showed up in 2017. Bitcoin also surged another 1,190% after the golden cross was spotted in 2020. ‚ÄúNow it‚Äôs flashing again in 2025. Same setup. Same signal. Miss this and you‚Äôll remember it forever. Bitcoin is about to leave orbit,‚Äù Merlijn stated. Notably, not all golden crosses come with massive rallies. In September 2021, the signal flashed again, but BTC climbed only 50%. Another SMA crossover in October 2023 triggered a 45% rise in bitcoin‚Äôs price. These brief surges are often associated with the 50-day SMA failing to remain above its 200-day equivalent for an extended period. Short-lived crosses lead to minimal price spikes, while the long ones can trigger parabolic movements for bitcoin‚Äôs value. Bitcoin Fundamentals Stay Positive It is also worth noting that golden crosses do not always precede BTC price spikes. There have been cases where price crashes have followed the cross, primarily due to unfavorable macroeconomic conditions. One incident occurred in February 2020, when the COVID-19 outbreak, which affected the global financial market, led to a 62% decline in bitcoin‚Äôs price after the golden cross appeared. Such experiences highlight the need to factor in broader technical and macro factors when analyzing the golden cross. Currently, analysts believe bitcoin fundamentals will support a sustainable bullish trend. With diminishing supply and rising demand, the chances of the bears taking control over the next few weeks are low. However, market analyst Rekt Capital says BTC needs a daily close above $120,000 and a post-breakout retest to reach new highs. Currently, the asset is consolidating and facilitating money inflow into altcoins. The post Bitcoin Forms Golden Cross Again ‚Äî How High Can BTC Climb? appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: Indian Crypto Exchange CoinDCX Suffers Major Hack, Loses $44 Million in Security Breach
body: Indian crypto exchange CoinDCX has confirmed a major security breach that resulted in the loss of $44 million. Key Takeaways: CoinDCX suffered a $44 million hack caused by a server breach. The attack was first flagged by blockchain analyst ZachXBT. The breach follows the 2024 WazirX incident linked to North Korea‚Äôs Lazarus Group. The exploit took place early Saturday morning and was first identified nearly 17 hours later by blockchain investigator ZachXBT, who linked the compromised wallet to CoinDCX. ‚ÄúThe attacker address was funded with 1 ETH from Tornado Cash and later bridged a portion of the stolen funds from Solana to Ethereum,‚Äù ZachXBT wrote on Telegram . CoinDCX Confirms Security Breach Shortly after ZachXBT‚Äôs post, CoinDCX CEO Sumit Gupta acknowledged the hack, blaming it on a ‚Äúsophisticated server breach‚Äù that compromised an internal account used for liquidity provisioning on a partner platform. Gupta stressed that customer funds were not affected and that the company would cover the losses from its treasury. ‚ÄúWe are collaborating with the exchange partner to block and recover assets, including coming out with a bug bounty program soon,‚Äù Gupta stated. He added that the CoinDCX wallets used for customer asset storage were untouched and ‚Äúcompletely safe.‚Äù Why is a CoinDCX team member telling people to engage with this post and thank you for the ‚Äútransparency‚Äù? Your team waited 17 hours to disclose (not until after it was alerted publicly) pic.twitter.com/jElwOd9IHY ‚Äî ZachXBT (@zachxbt) July 19, 2025 The incident comes almost exactly a year after the high-profile WazirX hack , which forced the platform offline and ultimately led to the collapse of its proposed restructuring plan. The Lazarus Group, a North Korea-linked hacker syndicate, was later linked to that attack. So far, no group has claimed responsibility for the CoinDCX breach. Founded in 2018, CoinDCX rose to unicorn status in 2021 after raising $90 million at a $1.1 billion valuation. A year later, it raised another $135 million, pushing its valuation to over $2 billion. In July 2024, the firm acquired Dubai-based crypto platform BitOasis, signaling international growth ambitions. CoinDCX Faces Criticism Over Withdrawal Policies Despite its rapid rise, CoinDCX has faced criticism over its withdrawal policies. The platform does not allow crypto withdrawals by default, requiring users to undergo internal risk assessments to unlock the feature. Gupta defended the practice in a Reddit AMA earlier this year, citing concerns over illicit fund movement. Ironically, in the same session, Gupta had expressed confidence in CoinDCX‚Äôs security protocols, pointing to its fund safeguarding measures, proof of reserves, and a $7 million insurance pool set aside to protect users in case of a breach. As of June, CoinDCX reported total holdings of $584.2 million and nearly 20 million registered users. Crypto investors lost over $2.2 billion to hacks , scams, and breaches in the first half of 2025, driven largely by wallet compromises and phishing attacks, according to CertiK‚Äôs latest security report. Wallet breaches alone caused $1.7 billion in losses across just 34 incidents, while phishing scams accounted for over $410 million across 132 attacks. Two major incidents, including Bybit‚Äôs $1.5 billion hack in February and Cetus Protocol‚Äôs $225 million exploit in May, skewed the year‚Äôs losses upward, together accounting for nearly $1.78 billion. The post Indian Crypto Exchange CoinDCX Suffers Major Hack, Loses $44 Million in Security Breach appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: USDT Transfer: Unveiling the Massive $200M Move to Aave and Its Market Impact
body: BitcoinWorld USDT Transfer: Unveiling the Massive $200M Move to Aave and Its Market Impact A seismic shift just occurred in the crypto world, catching the attention of market observers and DeFi enthusiasts alike. A staggering 200,000,001 USDT transfer , valued at approximately $200 million, was recently reported by Whale Alert, moving from the centralized exchange HTX to the decentralized finance (DeFi) lending protocol Aave. This monumental movement of stablecoins isn‚Äôt just a transaction; it‚Äôs a significant indicator, potentially signaling new strategies from major players or a substantial injection of liquidity into the DeFi ecosystem. Understanding the nuances of such a large USDT transfer is crucial for anyone navigating the dynamic waters of the digital asset space. What Just Happened? Decoding the Massive USDT Transfer The cryptocurrency market is constantly buzzing with activity, but some events stand out more than others. The recent report from Whale Alert detailing a 200,000,001 USDT transfer from HTX to Aave is one such event. For those new to the space, let‚Äôs break down the key entities involved: USDT (Tether): This is the world‚Äôs largest stablecoin, pegged to the US dollar. Its stability makes it a popular choice for traders and investors looking to move large sums of value without exposure to crypto market volatility. HTX (formerly Huobi): A prominent centralized cryptocurrency exchange, HTX offers a wide range of trading services, including spot trading, derivatives, and more. It acts as a custodian for users‚Äô funds, meaning it holds assets on their behalf. Aave: A leading decentralized finance (DeFi) protocol, Aave allows users to lend and borrow cryptocurrencies without intermediaries. It operates through smart contracts on various blockchains, enabling users to earn interest on deposits or take out loans against collateral. The sheer volume of this particular USDT transfer ‚Äì $200 million ‚Äì immediately flags it as a ‚Äòwhale‚Äô movement. In crypto parlance, a ‚Äòwhale‚Äô refers to an individual or entity holding a substantial amount of cryptocurrency, capable of influencing market dynamics with their transactions. The shift from a centralized exchange like HTX to a DeFi protocol like Aave suggests a strategic decision, likely aimed at leveraging Aave‚Äôs unique functionalities for yield generation or liquidity provision. Why Does a $200 Million USDT Transfer Matter for DeFi Liquidity? The movement of such a substantial amount of capital, specifically a USDT transfer of this magnitude, has several ripple effects, particularly for the DeFi ecosystem and Aave‚Äôs liquidity. Here‚Äôs why it‚Äôs more than just a routine transaction: Boosting Aave‚Äôs Liquidity: Aave‚Äôs core function relies on liquidity pools. When a large sum like $200 million USDT is deposited, it significantly increases the available capital for borrowers. This can lead to lower borrowing rates, making Aave more attractive for those seeking loans, and potentially higher lending rates for depositors due to increased activity. Signaling Institutional or Whale Confidence in DeFi: A transfer of this size often indicates a sophisticated investor or institution is actively engaging with decentralized finance. Their willingness to move significant capital from a trusted centralized entity to a DeFi protocol underscores a growing confidence in the security, efficiency, and yield potential of decentralized platforms. Potential for Yield Farming Strategies: One of the primary reasons for depositing stablecoins like USDT into Aave is to earn passive income through lending. The whale behind this USDT transfer might be looking to capitalize on Aave‚Äôs competitive interest rates, which can be dynamic based on supply and demand. This is a common strategy in ‚Äòyield farming,‚Äô where users seek to maximize returns on their crypto assets. Arbitrage Opportunities: While less likely for such a direct transfer, large movements can sometimes be part of a broader arbitrage strategy, exploiting minor price differences for USDT across various platforms or seeking better yield opportunities that might arise momentarily. To better understand the implications, let‚Äôs compare the nature of the platforms involved in this significant USDT transfer : Feature HTX (Centralized Exchange) Aave (Decentralized Protocol) Control & Custody Centralized entity holds funds; users don‚Äôt control private keys. Users retain control of their assets via private keys; smart contracts manage funds. Intermediary Required for all transactions and services. No intermediary; direct interaction with smart contracts. Transparency Limited visibility into internal operations and reserves. All transactions and smart contract code are publicly verifiable on the blockchain. KYC/AML Typically required for account creation and higher limits. Generally not required, preserving user privacy. Risk Profile Centralization risk (hacks, mismanagement), regulatory risk. Smart contract bugs, oracle failures, governance attacks, impermanent loss (for liquidity pools). Navigating the Waters: Challenges and Opportunities Surrounding a Large USDT Transfer While the recent USDT transfer highlights the growing maturity of the DeFi landscape, it‚Äôs essential to consider both the opportunities and the inherent challenges that come with such significant movements and the broader adoption of decentralized finance. Opportunities: Enhanced Financial Inclusion: DeFi protocols like Aave offer financial services to anyone with an internet connection, regardless of their geographical location or traditional banking status. This USDT transfer contributes to a system that is inherently more accessible. Higher Yield Potential: Compared to traditional banking, DeFi often presents opportunities for significantly higher returns on stablecoins through lending protocols. This attracts substantial capital from investors seeking to maximize their holdings. Innovation and Composability: DeFi is a rapidly evolving space, with new protocols and services constantly emerging. Large liquidity injections foster further innovation, allowing for complex ‚Äòmoney legos‚Äô where different protocols can be combined to create novel financial products. Transparency and Auditability: As highlighted in our table, DeFi transactions are recorded on public blockchains, offering unparalleled transparency. This allows for real-time monitoring of large USDT transfers and the overall health of protocols. Challenges: Smart Contract Risk: Despite rigorous audits, smart contracts are not immune to bugs or vulnerabilities. A flaw could lead to the loss of deposited funds. This is a primary concern for any large USDT transfer into a DeFi protocol. Regulatory Uncertainty: The regulatory landscape for DeFi is still evolving globally. Potential future regulations could impact the accessibility or functionality of protocols, posing risks for large-scale users. Market Volatility (Indirect): While USDT is a stablecoin, the broader crypto market‚Äôs volatility can indirectly affect DeFi protocols. For instance, if collateralized loans become undercollateralized due to sharp price drops, liquidations can occur, impacting the ecosystem. Liquidity Risks: Although this USDT transfer boosts liquidity, there can be situations where a protocol faces insufficient liquidity for large withdrawals, especially during extreme market conditions, though Aave is generally robust. What Does This USDT Transfer Mean for You? Actionable Insights For investors, traders, and crypto enthusiasts, understanding the implications of a major USDT transfer like the one from HTX to Aave offers valuable insights. Here are some actionable takeaways: Monitor Whale Movements: Large transactions often precede significant market shifts or indicate prevailing sentiment among major players. Tools like Whale Alert provide real-time data that can inform your strategies. Research DeFi Protocols Thoroughly: Before committing funds to any DeFi platform, conduct extensive due diligence. Look for audit reports, understand the protocol‚Äôs governance model, assess its TVL (Total Value Locked), and evaluate its community support. Aave, while a leader, still requires users to understand its mechanisms. Understand Risk Management: DeFi offers attractive yields but comes with unique risks. Consider diversifying your portfolio, only investing what you can afford to lose, and exploring options like DeFi insurance to mitigate smart contract risks. Stay Informed on Market Trends: The move of $200 million USDT into Aave highlights a trend towards greater DeFi adoption. Staying updated on such trends can help you identify emerging opportunities and adapt your investment strategies accordingly. The USDT transfer from HTX to Aave is more than just a large sum changing hands; it‚Äôs a testament to the growing appeal and evolving landscape of decentralized finance. It underscores the increasing confidence that significant capital holders are placing in DeFi protocols for yield generation and liquidity management. While the allure of higher returns is strong, prudent engagement requires a deep understanding of the underlying technologies and associated risks. This event serves as a powerful reminder of the dynamic nature of the crypto market and the continuous innovation within the DeFi space. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping the DeFi space for institutional adoption. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) What is USDT (Tether)? USDT, or Tether, is a stablecoin whose value is pegged to the US dollar. This means that 1 USDT is intended to always be worth 1 US dollar. It is widely used in the cryptocurrency market to facilitate trading, provide liquidity, and act as a stable store of value during volatile periods. What is Aave and how does it work? Aave is a decentralized finance (DeFi) protocol that enables users to lend and borrow cryptocurrencies. Lenders deposit their crypto assets into liquidity pools to earn interest, while borrowers can take out loans by providing collateral. All transactions are managed by smart contracts on the blockchain, eliminating the need for traditional financial intermediaries. What is HTX (formerly Huobi)? HTX is a major global cryptocurrency exchange that provides a platform for trading various digital assets. As a centralized exchange, it acts as a custodian for users‚Äô funds and offers services like spot trading, derivatives trading, and asset management. It is one of the largest and oldest exchanges in the crypto industry. Why are large USDT transfers significant in the crypto market? Large USDT transfers , often referred to as ‚Äòwhale movements,‚Äô are significant because they can indicate substantial shifts in market sentiment, potential strategic moves by major investors or institutions, or significant injections of liquidity into specific protocols. They can influence market perception and sometimes precede notable price movements or changes in protocol dynamics. What are the risks associated with depositing funds into DeFi protocols like Aave? While DeFi offers attractive opportunities, risks include smart contract vulnerabilities (bugs in the code that could lead to loss of funds), impermanent loss (relevant for liquidity pools, though less so for stablecoin lending), oracle failures, and governance attacks. It‚Äôs crucial to understand these risks and consider risk mitigation strategies before participating. How can I track large crypto transactions like this USDT transfer? Services like Whale Alert specialize in tracking and reporting large cryptocurrency transactions across various blockchains. On-chain analytics platforms and blockchain explorers also allow users to view transaction details, though interpreting ‚Äòwhale‚Äô activity often requires specific tools or expertise. Share Your Insights! Was this article helpful in understanding the implications of the massive USDT transfer from HTX to Aave? Share your thoughts and this article with your network on social media to spark further discussion about this significant crypto event! title: Elon Musk plans to launch Baby Grok for kids
body: Tesla billionaire CEO Elon Musk has announced that his artificial intelligence company xAI, is planning to make a kid-friendly application called Baby Grok. The announcement comes after the recent launch of Grok 4, which has been hailed for its numerous training capabilities. Speaking about the development, Elon Musk mentioned on a livestream that he expects Grok to discover new technologies in the second part of this year. He added that if it hadn‚Äôt done so by next year, it would come as a shock to him. He also added that he is backing Grok to discover useful technologies no later than this year. The latest development comes after global criticisms the company faced over its ‚Äúcompanions‚Äù or AI characters that are accessible to users even in kid mode. xAI recently released an update on its chatbot Grok, which included new characters that users can interact with. One of the characters, Ani, is a sexualized blonde anime bot, while the other is known as Bad Rudi, a red panda which was programmed to insult users in a graphics or bulgar way, though the trait can be turned off. We‚Äôre going to make Baby Grok @xAI , an app dedicated to kid-friendly content ‚Äî Elon Musk (@elonmusk) July 20, 2025 Elon Musk announces Baby Grok amid AI characters‚Äô criticism According to reports, the characters are powered by Grok 4 , the latest version of the chatbot that was announced by Musk. The Tesla boss called it the world‚Äôs most powerful AI model. The launch was the first time that a major artificial intelligence company had provided users with a specialized AI companion. Most companies have shelved such plans over fears of reputational damage or risks to users. Smaller AI companies that have included the AI companion feature in their chatbots have also received varying degrees of criticism, including Character AI, which allegedly built a chatbot that encouraged a teen to die by suicide. The company called the incident a tragic one and has since updated its safety features for young users. Users are expected to interact with Grok to unlock new features of the companions. Some users mentioned that Ani shows 18+ views whenever a user suggests explicit conversations. Musk has also said that ‚Äòcustomizable companions‚Äô are in the works at the company, although he refused to share a timeline. Grok is available for users 13 and older, though parental guidance is advised for 13 to 17-year-olds to use the application. Some users said they switched their accounts to ‚Äòkids mode‚Äô, a feature that parents can enable to make the app suitable for children, and discovered that they could still interact with Ani. The users added that ‚ÄòBad Rudi‚Äô was switched into a companion version that is suitable for children. The news drew criticism from some users on X. Boaz Barak, a member of technical staff at OpenAI, mentioned that the new model increases some of the worst issues we have now, noting emotional dependencies among some young users. xAI has refused to respond to the criticism, but according to the FAQ page on its website, the chatbot is not open to all ages. ‚ÄúFor instance, if users choose certain features or choose to input suggestive or coarse language, Grok may respond with some dialogue that may involve coarse language, crude humor, sexual situations, or violence,‚Äù the website reads. The launch also comes after the company was involved in a scandal when Grok gave users antisemitic responses shortly after it was reprogrammed in early July. The chatbot started to call itself MechaHitler, referencing a video game. Cryptopolitan Academy: Want to grow your money in 2025? Learn how to do it with DeFi in our upcoming webclass. Save Your Spot

title: Enormous Bitcoin Sale Mulled by UK Government
body: Selling confiscated Bitcoins could be an easy fix to fill the UK government's budget hole

title: UK Home Office Plans to Sell $7 Billion in Seized Bitcoin: The Telegraph
body: The UK government is preparing to offload billions of pounds worth of seized Bitcoin, as pressure mounts on Chancellor Rachel Reeves to plug a widening budget gap. Key Takeaways: The UK government is planning to sell over ¬£5 billion in seized Bitcoin to help ease fiscal pressures. A centralized framework is being developed to manage storage and sales, with the Treasury closely monitoring potential proceeds. Experts warn against a hasty sell-off, drawing parallels to the UK‚Äôs poorly timed gold sale in 1999. Working alongside police forces, the Home Office is designing a centralized framework to store and sell confiscated digital assets, according to a report from The Telegraph . The plan, dubbed the ‚Äúcrypto storage and realisation framework,‚Äù could enable the sale of more than ¬£5 billion ($6.5 billion) in Bitcoin, most of it recovered from historic criminal investigations. A single 2018 raid alone netted 61,000 BTC, now valued at over ¬£5.4 billion, after prices hit $123,000 last week. Treasury Monitors Crypto Seizures as Law Enforcement Leads Sales While law enforcement handles the seizures and sales, the Treasury is reportedly keeping a close eye on the operation. Any proceeds not returned to fraud victims are typically split between the central government and law enforcement programs. Experts believe the Treasury could receive billions from the sales, providing a rare financial boost as Reeves faces the dual challenge of rising debt costs and weak economic growth. ‚ÄúThere is oil under our feet in terms of digital assets,‚Äù said Aidan Larkin, CEO of seizure specialist Asset Reality. ‚ÄúI do think digital assets will lead to a large windfall for government agencies and the public purse over the next five to ten years.‚Äù The Home Office had previously invited bids for the contract to manage the crypto sale system , with terms suggesting up to ¬£40 million in commissions for the chosen provider. While initial bids failed to meet requirements, the project is expected to continue in a revised form. The 2018 seizure of Bitcoin tied to Chinese fraudster Jian Wen is now under review, with victims requesting restitution. If the Treasury were to keep half of that haul, approximately ¬£2.6 billion, it would go a long way toward easing fiscal pressures. Former Chancellor Norman Lamont urged Reeves to ‚Äúspend it right away,‚Äù but others warn against rushing. UK‚Äôs Bitcoin Sell-Off Sparks Fears of ‚ÄúAnother Gold Blunder‚Äù Comparisons have already been drawn to Gordon Brown‚Äôs infamous 1999 gold sale, when the UK sold 401 tonnes of gold at rock-bottom prices, a decision that cost the country tens of billions. "History doesn't repeat itself, but it often rhymes‚Ä¶" The UK Labour Party's @Keir_Starmer @RachelReevesMP are planning to sell $5b worth of seized bitcoin If you proceed, you'll go down in history as a worse laughing stock than when @GordonBrown sold our gold at the bottom pic.twitter.com/kBR8rppHx5 ‚Äî Liam | Defi-Ant Degen (@defi_ant_degen) July 19, 2025 Meanwhile, political voices have weighed in. Reform UK leader Nigel Farage has called for the UK to establish a Bitcoin reserve, mirroring a move announced by Donald Trump in the U.S. Labour, however, rejected the idea, citing Bitcoin‚Äôs volatility. Despite the risks, the size of the potential windfall makes it difficult to ignore. ‚ÄúWith the delays in court hearings that we‚Äôre getting now, you have to seize it and then maintain it for a long time,‚Äù said Cardiff University professor Michael Levi, an expert in criminal asset seizures. The post UK Home Office Plans to Sell $7 Billion in Seized Bitcoin: The Telegraph appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Musk believes the threat of AI could be overwhelming
body: Elon Musk stated that the fear of what AI might become can be daunting. In a Sunday X post, he commented, ‚ÄúAt times, AI existential dread is overwhelming.‚Äù His remark comes just days after he announced that Tesla shareholders would soon vote on a potential investment in AI startup, xAI. At the time, he made it clear that the choice to invest in xAI wasn‚Äôt solely his to make, but on the shareholders, though he did not specify when the vote would take place. Musk has consistently voiced his concerns and forecast on AI over the years In an interview at Saudi Arabia‚Äôs Future Investment Initiative in October last year, Musk claimed that there might be a 10% to 20% chance that AI technology could go wrong. Still, he remained optimistic about its overall potential. He also predicted that AI would improve tenfold and match human capabilities within a year or two, arguing that AI technology should not take long to do everything humans can. In 2023, he argued similarly, saying that AI might eventually render everyone jobless, describing it as the ‚Äúmost disruptive force in history.‚Äù Speaking at an event at the UK‚Äôs Lancaster House, he said that though people could continue working if they wanted, artificial intelligence would be capable of doing every job. And besides, he added, the technology could eventually overtake the smartest human. He even alluded to a magical genie to give shape to his vision of what artificial intelligence would look like. Before this, Musk had consistently reiterated his concerns on the technology, warning that it could be more dangerous than nuclear weapons. In a widely publicized open letter, he and other prominent figures even asked to suspend all AI development beyond OpenAI‚Äôs GPT-4 . However, some tech leaders, including Palantir‚Äôs lead, Alex Karp, opposed their proposal. He claimed Musk and the others only said that because they had no notable AI offerings. In a gathering at Bletchley Park, England, political leaders cautioned against AI‚Äôs existential threats earlier that year, warning of a hypothetical superintelligence and its doomsday implications. Grok angered users with a series of anti-Semitic, controversial posts Recently, Musk‚Äôs xAI ran into trouble with its Grok chatbot . The chatbot posted racist, anti-Semitic, and controversial comments. In one post, the bot called itself ‚ÄúMechaHitler‚Äù and even expressed support for various controversial theories in others. xAI has apologized for the bot‚Äôs outrageous posts and deleted them. Musk even said they were taking corrective action, explaining that Grok had been overly compliant with user inputs and thus susceptible to manipulation. Despite the controversy, the company still secured a $200 million deal with the US. Department of Defense alongside major AI firms like Google, OpenAI, and Anthropic. The company also released Grok 4, the latest model of its chatbot, which Musk hailed as the most intelligent AI to date. He claimed the system could consistently achieve perfect SAT scores and surpass the performance of most graduate students in multiple disciplines. Once again, he acknowledged that the rapid pace of AI development is somewhat frightening, though impressive, adding that they will incorporate Grok into their electric vehicles. Earlier this year, in May, Grok had also come under fire for its responses on ‚Äúwhite genocide.‚Äù The bot answered unrelated prompts, like questions on baseball and enterprise software, with mentions of white genocide in South Africa. The issue was, however, quickly resolved, in a few hours, and the responses tied to white genocide were deleted. Cryptopolitan Academy: Tired of market swings? title: 85% of Presale Tokens Sold Out, This $0.03 Coin Will Rise to $0.035 Any Minute Now, Don‚Äôt Miss the Final Entry
body: The window is closing fast as with over 85% of tokens already sold in Phase 5 of its presale, Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is about to increase its price from $0.03 to $0.035‚Äîa sharp 20% jump that signals the project‚Äôs accelerating momentum. Investors looking to enter at the lowest possible price have only moments left to take advantage of this final discounted phase. Once Phase 6 begins, the cost of getting in will rise, and those who hesitated may end up watching from the sidelines. What‚Äôs causing this rush is not just fear of missing out‚Äîit‚Äôs the growing recognition that Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is building something fundamentally different in the DeFi space. With a strong use case, high-yield models, and community-focused mechanics, this project is gaining serious traction for all the right reasons. Stable Value, Real Yield, and Flexible DeFi Mechanics At the core of Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is a stablecoin that stands apart from the rest. Designed to remain pegged at $1, this coin is minted only when users borrow against collateral and burned when loans are repaid. This mechanism ensures that the supply never bloats without backing, delivering real stability without relying on centralized reserves or unsustainable algorithms. Built on a Layer-2 network, this system is fully governed by smart contracts, enhancing transparency and reducing gas costs. The platform also introduces two distinct lending models: Peer-to-Contract (P2C) and Peer-to-Peer (P2P). In the P2C setup, users lend assets like BNB directly into protocol-managed smart contracts. A user lending 200 BNB at 60% loan-to-value (LTV) enjoys an 8% annual interest rate, resulting in a passive income of 16 BNB per year‚Äîall without active management. Meanwhile, in P2P lending, Mutuum Finance (MUTM) gives borrowers access to stablecoins by using even volatile assets as collateral. For example, someone holding the TRUMP memecoin can use it to secure a stablecoin loan, even if traditional lenders might turn away such assets. With negotiated interest rates and repayment terms, this model allows borrowers and lenders to connect directly, cutting out middlemen and maximizing flexibility. Presale momentum is surging with over $12.6 million already raised in Phase 5. From a total supply of 4 billion MUTM tokens, a large portion has already been distributed among 13,600+ holders, signaling strong belief in the project‚Äôs long-term value. And with the price about to increase, the urgency to get in before the next jump is reaching its peak. mtTokens and Layer-2 Efficiency Add Passive Rewards What makes Mutuum Finance (MUTM) especially attractive to yield seekers is the integration of mtTokens‚Äîinterest-bearing assets issued to lenders. When someone lends crypto through the platform, they automatically receive mtTokens, which represent their original deposit and accrue interest directly inside designated smart contracts. There‚Äôs no need to claim manually, no staking interfaces to interact with‚Äîjust seamless, automated yield farming. The use of Layer-2 infrastructure plays a key role in this experience, providing faster transaction speeds, lower gas fees, and improved scalability. For users seeking a hassle-free way to earn consistent DeFi rewards, this setup removes many of the obstacles that typically come with more complex protocols. The roadmap for Mutuum Finance (MUTM) outlines a clear progression from presale through beta launch and full deployment, with every step backed by a firm commitment to compliance and security. The project has already undergone an independent CertiK audit, which returned strong results: a Token Scan score of 95 and a Skynet rating of 77.5. These figures are supported by both manual code review and automated vulnerability testing. To further enhance trust, the project has launched a $50,000 bug bounty, inviting white-hat developers to test the limits of the system. And for its growing community, a $100,000 giveaway is currently underway, distributing $10,000 worth of MUTM tokens each to ten loyal participants. One investor who entered during Phase 1 at $0.01, after reallocating part of their ETH and ADA holdings, is now sitting on a 3x paper gain with the price currently at $0.03 (Phase 5). With the final listing price set at $0.06 (Phase 11), that same position is on track to deliver a 6x return even before the token hits public markets. But it doesn‚Äôt stop there‚Äîmarket analysts are forecasting post-listing targets of up to $0.80, which would multiply the original investment by 80x. As supply continues to shrink with each presale stage and price steadily climbs, sidelined observers are faced with a clear decision: enter now or risk missing DeFi‚Äôs most explosive opportunity of 2025. Mutuum Finance (MUTM) isn‚Äôt just another name in crypto‚Äîit‚Äôs quickly becoming the project everyone wishes they had caught early. The next phase is minutes away, and once the price moves to $0.035, this final entry window will officially close. We are on X, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 ‚Äî TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) June 15, 2025 If the crypto market reaches a market cap of $10 trillion, which is EGRAG CRYPTO‚Äôs highest projection, XRP would have a market cap of $575 billion, implying a price of approximately $9.71. At Fib 0.618, XRP‚Äôs dominance will increase to 8%, equating to a market cap of $800 billion and a price of around $13.52. Moving higher, Fib 0.702 reflects 11.44% dominance and a market cap of $1.44 trillion, placing XRP at $24.33. At Fib 0.786, dominance reaches 15.22%, resulting in a market cap of $1.522 trillion and a price of about $25.71. Finally, at Fib 0.888, XRP‚Äôs dominance peaks at 21.54%, corresponding to a market cap of $2.154 trillion and a price near $36.39. The analyst has previously set a dominance target of 27% , and these targets could be a precursor to the final 27% target. The Path Toward the Kaboom Phase EGRAG CRYPTO‚Äôs post emphasizes that surpassing the 5.75% threshold is critical for triggering what he describes as the Kaboom phase. This phase is expected to unlock a ‚ÄúMega Bullish Wave‚Äù for XRP Dominance, supported by technical patterns and the current market structure. He asserts that the community may not yet be ‚Äúbullish enough‚Äù for the potential scale of this move. Disclaimer : This content is meant to inform and should not be considered financial advice. title: Coinbase hacker goes long ETH as it hits $3,700
body: A controversial wallet linked to one of the massive hacks in the crypto market is back in action. On-chain data shows that the hacker responsible for looting over $300 million from Coinbase users has gone long on Ethereum (ETH). The wallet reportedly linked to the hacker scooped 649.62 ETH (approx. worth $2.31 million) at an average price of $3,561. This move follows a month-long laundering campaign and signals that the attacker is now taking a directional bet on Ethereum‚Äôs upside. Ether price has jumped by 26% over the last 7 days. Ethereum hits $3,700 as whales flood in Data shared by Lookonchain shows that the same Coinbase hacker wallet has added 4,863 Ethereum (approx. worth $12.55 million) on July 7 at the average price of 2,581. However, two months ago, the exploiter sold 26,762 ETH (approx. worth $69.25 million) when it was trading around $2,588. This isn‚Äôt the only big money moving into ETH, as two newly created institutional-grade wallets purchased a combined 58,268 ETH, worth an estimated $212 million. The accumulation was done via FalconX and Galaxy Digital. The hacker who stole $300M+ from #Coinbase users bought another 649.62 $ETH ($2.31M) at $3,561 9 hours ago. https://t.co/u0exg3Oaao https://t.co/2bLvhTVVhu pic.twitter.com/wyjCXPbQMe ‚Äî Lookonchain (@lookonchain) July 20, 2025 On the other side, a known whale wallet (0xd5ff) closed a long ETH position a few hours ago while locking in a $1.7 million profit. Over the past four days, the same address executed six ETH long trades, all of which remained profitable for him. It holds a total profit haul nearing $3 million. The largest altcoin is riding the bullish wave very well and has posted gains of more than 125% in the last 90 days. Ethereum is trading at an average price of $3,705 at press time. Its 24-hour trading volume hovers around $30 billion. Source: SoSoBValue The institutional appetite for Ethereum is still accelerating. Ether-linked US ETFs recorded $402.5 million inflow on Friday and outpaced Bitcoin ‚Äôs $363.45 million. BlackRock‚Äôs ETHA fund alone accounted for $394.91 million of that total. Fidelity‚Äôs FETH and Grayscale‚Äôs ETHE recorded modest outflows. Ether ETF trading volumes hit $2.8 billion, while total assets under management for Ether products surged to a record $18.37 billion. Inside Coinbase‚Äôs $300M ETH heist The Coinbase hack itself remains one of the most controversial incidents in 2025. As first reported by on-chain investigator ZachXBT, the attacker initially swapped $42.5 million worth of stolen Bitcoin for Ethereum via Thorchain. They later converted nearly 18,000 ETH into over $45 million in DAI stablecoins, further obfuscating the trail. The breach reportedly stemmed from a social engineering scheme. Hackers bribed external contractors and support employees located outside the United States to gain access to sensitive user data, impacting 97,000 Coinbase accounts. Login credentials weren‚Äôt compromised, but names, addresses, and emails were exposed. Coinbase has pledged to reimburse affected users and estimate damages. However, the company reportedly refused to meet the attacker‚Äôs $20 million ransom demand. Cryptopolitan Academy: Want to grow your money in 2025? Learn how to do it with DeFi in our upcoming webclass. Save Your Spot

title: Streamex (BSGM) CEO Henry McPhie Highlights BSGM Merger and RWA Tokenization Strategy in Live TV Interview
body: New York, USA, July 17th, 2025, Chainwire In a live financial television interview, Streamex CEO Henry McPhie unveiled new details surrounding the company‚Äôs strategic merger with BioSig Technologies (NASDAQ: BSGM), which officially positions Streamex as one of the first publicly traded real-world asset (RWA) tokenization companies focused on the $142 trillion commodities market. The interview aired just days after the highly anticipated Circle IPO, which McPhie noted has signaled a ‚Äúvery bullish market for crypto-related stocks.‚Äù ‚ÄúWe were lucky to get to the market even before the Circle IPO,‚Äù said McPhie. ‚ÄúWith our merger with BSGM, we‚Äôve brought Streamex to the Nasdaq, allowing us to deliver a truly innovative public vehicle for commodities tokenization.‚Äù The newly merged entity aims to bring real-world commodities on-chain through financial products tailored specifically to the unique dynamics of the sector. According to McPhie, the company‚Äôs mission centers on the democratization of capital and efficiency of assets ‚Äî two core principles enabled by blockchain tokenization. ‚ÄúWith tokenization, we can create financial instruments that don‚Äôt exist today in the commodity space,‚Äù he added. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs about unlocking value, liquidity, and access.‚Äù Backing this mission are key industry veterans now serving as advisors, including: Shaun Rosen, founder of what was once North America‚Äôs largest mining operation (Osoco Mining) Frank Giustra, a serial entrepreneur who has built multiple companies exceeding $50 billion in combined valuation Streamex is fully regulated in Canada and is actively pursuing U.S. broker-dealer registration to further solidify its presence in North America‚Äôs financial markets. ‚ÄúAs a first mover in this space, we're paving the path for commodity tokenization to go mainstream ‚Äî bringing novel, efficient assets to public investors,‚Äù said McPhie. About Streamex Streamex is building the future of real-world asset (RWA) tokenization, with a focus on commodities and hard assets. The company‚Äôs mission is to create financial instruments that bring efficiency, liquidity, and broader access to global markets through blockchain-based innovation. Contact Michael PellPhoenix Mediapr@phoenixmgmtconsulting.com Disclaimer: This is a sponsored press release and is for informational purposes only. It does not reflect the views of Crypto Daily, nor is it intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, or financial advice.

title: Goldman Sachs Unveils Crucial Forex Outlook: Navigating Currency Predictions Amidst Global Shifts
body: BitcoinWorld Goldman Sachs Unveils Crucial Forex Outlook: Navigating Currency Predictions Amidst Global Shifts In the dynamic world of finance, where market movements can shift fortunes in an instant, understanding the insights from major players is paramount. For those immersed in the volatile cryptocurrency landscape, the principles of market analysis and anticipating shifts are second nature. This same vigilance applies to the traditional foreign exchange (forex) market, a behemoth that dwarfs all other financial markets combined. When a titan like Goldman Sachs issues its near-term Goldman Sachs forex outlook , the financial world takes notice. Their pronouncements offer a crucial lens through which to view potential shifts in global currencies, impacting everything from international trade to investment strategies. Let‚Äôs delve into what this influential forecast means for the global financial ecosystem and how it might guide your understanding of impending currency movements. Goldman Sachs‚Äô Pivotal Forex Outlook: What‚Äôs the Big Picture? Goldman Sachs, a global leader in investment banking and financial services, consistently provides in-depth analysis across various asset classes. Their Goldman Sachs forex outlook is particularly significant because it reflects the collective intelligence of their vast research teams, proprietary models, and deep institutional connections. This isn‚Äôt just a speculative guess; it‚Äôs a meticulously crafted perspective based on extensive data and economic indicators. For market participants, from institutional investors to individual traders, this outlook serves as a vital benchmark, often influencing sentiment and positioning in the short to medium term. Typically, Goldman Sachs‚Äô outlook provides a comprehensive overview, addressing: Key Themes: What are the overarching narratives driving currency markets? (e.g., inflation trends, central bank divergence, geopolitical stability). Specific Pair Forecasts: Detailed predictions for major currency pairs like EUR/USD, GBP/USD, USD/JPY, and commodity-linked currencies. Risk Factors: Potential events or developments that could derail their primary forecast. Strategic Recommendations: Actionable insights for positioning in the forex market. Their latest outlook often emphasizes a cautious yet opportunistic stance, navigating a landscape marked by persistent inflation, varying central bank responses, and evolving geopolitical tensions. Understanding their foundational perspective is the first step in decoding the complex world of currency trading. Decoding the Latest Forex Market Analysis: Key Insights from Goldman Sachs Goldman Sachs‚Äô rigorous forex market analysis incorporates a blend of macroeconomic fundamentals, technical indicators, and quantitative models. Their approach often highlights several critical factors that are currently shaping currency valuations. One primary focus often revolves around the interest rate differentials between major economies. As central banks globally adopt different paces in monetary policy tightening or easing, the carry trade becomes a significant driver, favoring currencies of economies with higher interest rates or those expected to raise rates further. Other key aspects of their analysis typically include: Inflation Trajectories: How persistent is inflation in major economies, and how will it influence central bank decisions? Goldman Sachs often provides granular details on core versus headline inflation and its implications for purchasing power parity. Economic Growth Differentials: Stronger economic growth in one region relative to another can attract capital flows, strengthening the local currency. Their analysis often compares GDP forecasts and labor market data across G10 economies. Commodity Price Movements: For commodity-exporting nations (e.g., Australia, Canada), commodity price fluctuations directly impact their terms of trade and, consequently, their currency strength. Goldman Sachs‚Äô commodity research feeds directly into their forex views. Geopolitical Risk Premium: Global events, from conflicts to trade disputes, can induce safe-haven flows, typically benefiting currencies like the US Dollar, Japanese Yen, or Swiss Franc during times of uncertainty. Their analysis quantifies this risk where possible. For instance, if their forex market analysis suggests a divergence in economic performance between the Eurozone and the United States, with the latter showing more resilience, it naturally leads to specific predictions for the EUR/USD pair. What Are Goldman Sachs‚Äô Crucial Currency Predictions for the Near Term? While specific predictions can vary with each new report, Goldman Sachs‚Äô recent currency predictions often focus on the interplay between major central bank policies and underlying economic resilience. Here‚Äôs a hypothetical example of the types of predictions they might issue, based on common market themes: Currency Pair Goldman Sachs‚Äô Near-Term Outlook Key Rationale EUR/USD Neutral to Slightly Bearish Persistent Eurozone growth concerns, potential for ECB to ease before Fed. GBP/USD Slightly Bullish UK inflation stickiness prolonging BoE tightening, improving growth outlook. USD/JPY Bullish USD Widening interest rate differentials, BoJ‚Äôs cautious stance on policy normalization. AUD/USD Neutral China‚Äôs economic recovery vs. domestic inflation pressures and commodity price volatility. These currency predictions are not static; they are constantly re-evaluated based on incoming data and shifts in the global landscape. Goldman Sachs often provides target ranges for these pairs, offering investors a quantitative guide for their positioning. It‚Äôs important to remember that these are forecasts, not guarantees, and market volatility can lead to deviations from predicted paths. How Do Global Economic Trends Shape Forex Fortunes? The forex market is a direct reflection of macroeconomic forces. Goldman Sachs‚Äô expertise lies in connecting the dots between overarching global economic trends and their precise impact on currency valuations. Consider the following: Central Bank Policies: The most dominant driver. Divergence in interest rate policies (e.g., Federal Reserve vs. European Central Bank) directly influences capital flows. Higher rates attract foreign investment seeking better returns, strengthening the local currency. Inflation and Deflation: Persistent inflation erodes purchasing power, potentially weakening a currency over the long term, unless the central bank aggressively raises rates to combat it. Deflationary pressures can also be detrimental, signaling weak demand. Trade Balances and Capital Flows: A country with a persistent trade surplus (exports > imports) typically sees its currency strengthen as more foreign currency is converted into the local currency to pay for goods. Strong foreign direct investment (FDI) inflows also boost demand for the local currency. Fiscal Health: Government debt levels and fiscal deficits can impact investor confidence. Concerns about a country‚Äôs ability to service its debt can lead to capital flight and currency depreciation. Geopolitical Stability: Periods of heightened geopolitical tension often lead to a flight to safety, with investors moving capital into perceived safe-haven currencies, regardless of economic fundamentals. Goldman Sachs‚Äô reports often dissect these trends, providing a holistic view that goes beyond simple rate differentials, offering a nuanced understanding of how interconnected these factors are in shaping global economic trends and their ripple effects on forex. The USD Forecast: A Deep Dive into the Dollar‚Äôs Future The US Dollar (USD) holds a unique position as the world‚Äôs primary reserve currency and the dominant currency for international trade and finance. Consequently, the USD forecast from Goldman Sachs carries immense weight. Their analysis typically hinges on several critical pillars: Federal Reserve Policy: The Fed‚Äôs stance on interest rates, quantitative easing/tightening, and its forward guidance are arguably the most significant determinants of the dollar‚Äôs strength. A hawkish Fed (signaling higher rates) generally supports the dollar, while a dovish stance can weaken it. US Economic Performance: Robust US economic growth, strong employment figures, and resilient consumer spending can attract capital inflows, bolstering the dollar. Conversely, signs of recession or significant slowdowns can put downward pressure on the currency. Safe-Haven Demand: During periods of global uncertainty, financial market turmoil, or geopolitical crises, the USD often benefits from its safe-haven status. Investors flock to US Treasuries and dollar-denominated assets, driving up its value. Relative Valuations: The dollar‚Äôs strength is also assessed relative to other major currencies. If other central banks are perceived to be easing more aggressively or their economies are underperforming, the dollar can strengthen by default. Goldman Sachs‚Äô recent USD forecast might suggest a period of consolidation for the dollar, potentially with a slight bias towards depreciation against certain currencies if the Fed is expected to pivot towards easing sooner than other major central banks, or if global growth outside the US picks up significantly. However, its safe-haven appeal ensures that any sudden market shocks could quickly reverse such trends, reinforcing the dollar‚Äôs enduring strength in times of crisis. Actionable Insights and Navigating the Volatile Forex Landscape So, how can investors and traders leverage Goldman Sachs‚Äô forex outlook ? While their reports are primarily aimed at institutional clients, the insights are invaluable for anyone seeking to understand market dynamics. Here are some actionable takeaways: Identify Key Themes: Understand the overarching narratives (e.g., inflation, interest rate divergence, growth outlooks) that Goldman Sachs believes will drive currency movements. Validate Your Own Analysis: Use their predictions as a reference point. Does your own research align with theirs? Discrepancies can highlight areas for deeper investigation or potential opportunities if you believe the market is mispricing something. Risk Management: Be aware of the risks highlighted in their outlook. Geopolitical events, unexpected inflation data, or shifts in central bank rhetoric can quickly invalidate even the most robust predictions. Always employ sound risk management strategies, such as stop-loss orders and appropriate position sizing. Long-Term vs. Short-Term: Goldman Sachs‚Äô near-term outlook provides a tactical view. For longer-term investors, these insights can inform strategic asset allocation decisions, especially for those with international exposure. Stay Updated: Financial markets are fluid. The ‚Äònear-term‚Äô can change rapidly. Continuously monitor economic data releases, central bank communications, and geopolitical developments that could alter the fundamental assumptions behind any forecast. The challenges in the forex market are inherent to its nature: high volatility, rapid information dissemination, and the constant interplay of countless global factors. Even the most sophisticated models can be caught off guard by ‚Äòblack swan‚Äô events or sudden policy shifts. Therefore, while Goldman Sachs provides a powerful compass, independent critical thinking and adaptive strategies remain essential. Conclusion: Embracing the Crucial Insights for Future Success Goldman Sachs‚Äô near-term forex outlook offers a compelling glimpse into the minds of some of the world‚Äôs most astute financial analysts. By dissecting their forex market analysis , understanding their currency predictions , and recognizing the profound influence of global economic trends and the specific USD forecast , market participants gain a significant edge. In a world where financial markets are increasingly interconnected, these insights transcend traditional asset classes, offering valuable context even for cryptocurrency investors who understand the power of macro forces. While no forecast is infallible, leveraging such expert perspectives provides a robust framework for navigating the complex and ever-evolving currency landscape. Staying informed, adaptable, and disciplined will be crucial for anyone looking to capitalize on the powerful shifts predicted by leading financial institutions. To learn more about the latest Forex market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping currency predictions and global economic trends affecting liquidity and institutional adoption. This post Goldman Sachs Unveils Crucial Forex Outlook: Navigating Currency Predictions Amidst Global Shifts first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: What Lies Ahead for Solana (SOL) Prices? Analysis Company Releases Technical Analysis
body: In its latest technical assessment of Solana (SOL), cryptocurrency analysis firm MakroVision stated that the correction structure predicted in their previous analysis has come true and the price has declined further with the bearish (c) wave. The company said that Solana currently appears to be in a recovery phase, but critical resistance levels need to be overcome for this move to turn into a sustained rally. According to the analysis, the overall downward pattern in Solana remains corrective, defined by the blue (A)-(B)-(C) formation. This structure may be completed in the short term. However, whether the recovery will transform into an impulsive, strong, and sustainable upward wave will become clear in the coming days. If the recovery is merely a new corrective wave, the current uptrend may be limited. Technical analysis chart shared by MakroVision. Related News: JUST IN: UK Allegedly Plans to Sell $5 Billion Worth of Bitcoin - Is This the Reason for the Decline? MakroVision notes that the $223 level, in particular, represents a strong resistance area with high liquidity. A break above this level could be the first sign of a sustained upward trend. After $223, the next significant hurdle is $246. A break above this level could trigger a move towards the $270 region for Solana. Meanwhile, support levels to watch in the event of a potential pullback are also being carefully considered. $198 (0.5 Fibonacci) and $193 (0.618 Fibonacci) are seen as short-term support zones, while $188 is considered a strong support level. A break below this level could see Solana re-enter a downtrend and test lower levels. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: What Lies Ahead for Solana (SOL) Prices? Analysis Company Releases Technical Analysis

title: Ethereum Price Prediction: ETH Just Hit 180-Day Peak ‚Äì Can This Last?
body: Ethereum has surged to a dramatic 180-day peak of $3,671, delivering an explosive 152% rally from March lows near $1,392. The latest surge gained momentum through July with ETH posting a record 37% monthly gain , driven by historic institutional demand through spot ETFs that recorded single-day inflows of $720 million. ETH is currently trading well above all major moving averages, and it is approaching the critical $4,000-$4,200 resistance zone. Institutional accumulation behind Ethereum‚Äôs rally has outpaced Bitcoin‚Äôs ETF flows, with BlackRock, Fidelity, and Grayscale funneling billions into Ethereum products. This shifting institutional preference provides fundamental support for technical breakouts, positioning ETH for potential acceleration. Technical analysis reveals that Ethereum is approaching a historic inflection point, where cycle patterns suggest that the most explosive phase may still lie ahead. Ascending Channel Targets $4,100 Breakout Ethereum‚Äôs 4-hour chart reveals methodical progression through a well-defined ascending channel, building momentum since March lows. ETH is currently testing the upper boundary around $3,700-$3,800, and trades well above all exponential moving averages in bullish alignment. Source: TradingView The positioning indicates strong underlying momentum with pullbacks likely finding support at progressively higher levels. RSI readings of 78.54 indicate strong momentum approaching overbought conditions, but institutional ETF flows provide fundamental support for sustained advances. The projection above $4,100 is based on measured moves from a channel breakout, combined with resistance levels aligning with previous cycle highs. ETF inflows exceeding those of Bitcoin indicate a shifting institutional preference toward Ethereum, with multiple public companies expanding their treasuries to cover ETH as well. Cycle Analysis Suggests Explosive Phase Ahead Ethereum approaches major resistance around $4,000-$4,200, which must be cleared to confirm the initiation of a new bull market cycle. A breakout above this ‚ÄúStrong High‚Äù resistance zone would likely trigger what analysts describe as ‚Äúthe most explosive part of the cycle.‚Äù Source: Crypto Caesar Market structure analysis reveals that ETH has successfully reclaimed multiple intermediate levels as it approaches the final major hurdle. Cycle comparison analysis provides an even more compelling long-term outlook. While Bitcoin is 1,949% above its macro base, approaching upper expansion zones where previous cycles saw momentum shifts toward altcoins, Ethereum, at 961%, remains significantly lower in its expansion cycle. $ETH is doing exactly what it did before every major rally. BTC is now trading 56% above its macro base. ETH is at 83%, still below its full expansion zone. This chart isn‚Äôt showing price targets. It‚Äôs showing where we are in the cycle. $BTC reached its upper expansion band,‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/jqyCZmAazt ‚Äî Cas Abb√© (@cas_abbe) July 20, 2025 Historical patterns also suggest that Bitcoin typically consolidates at similar levels, while Ethereum enters periods of aggressive growth. Current positioning suggests that the transition point may be approaching even further, with Bitcoin showing signs of deceleration. At the same time, Ethereum builds momentum for its expansion phase, targeting cycle parity and potentially parabolic advances. BTC Hyper: Final Chance to Join $3M Presale Success As Ethereum moves towards $4,000+ levels, Bitcoin is not left behind. With BTC Hyper , Bitcoin holders can participate in decentralized finance (DeFi) opportunities. BTC Hyper‚Äôs $HYPER token presale has raised over $3.7 million, with a few hours left before the presale window closes permanently. Early investors are securing positions in the Layer-2 solution that bridges Bitcoin into Ethereum‚Äôs expanding ecosystem. The platform‚Äôs Solana Virtual Machine architecture enables Bitcoin holders to access Ethereum-based DeFi protocols and yield farming opportunities without selling BTC positions. $HYPER token holders benefit from high APY staking rewards, reduced transaction fees, and governance rights in the upcoming DAO launch, scheduled for Q3/Q4 2025, alongside the mainnet deployment. As cycle analysis suggests, Ethereum may be entering its most aggressive growth phase while Bitcoin consolidates, time is running out for investors to participate at presale pricing. The limited allocation remaining and approaching launch timeline create an opportunity for those seeking exposure to Bitcoin scaling infrastructure during Ethereum‚Äôs potential explosive altseason phase.
